name: gitgpt
description: "GitGPT is a powerful and intuitive VS Code extension designed to streamline your code review process. Leveraging the advanced capabilities of OpenAI's GPT model, GitGPT automatically generates insightful and context-aware comments for your commits based on the diff. With a simple click on the icon next to the comment area, GitGPT provides you with a relevant comment, saving you time and enhancing your productivity. Whether you're a solo developer or part of a collaborative team, GitGPT is an essential tool to make your coding and review process more efficient and effective."
